ygData.subject: RE: RE: Niv's Melody of Preservation
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Berserker Strength shows as HP Absorb Shield (this is what Niv s really is btw)  [Protective Skin is misworded]  The shield is what I refer to as Rune
ygData.messageBody:
> Cool Harm, what the Shield from Berserker Strength read?

Berserker Strength shows as HP Absorb Shield (this is what Niv's
really is btw) [Protective Skin is misworded] The shield is what
I refer to as 'Rune shielding' after the Rune series. Our new
song is half as powerful as the Berserker Strength shielding
(Enchanter 20).

The Strength component is slightly better than the Shaman L29
spell called Raging Strength. The new song has the same
Strength component as the Berserker Strength (Enchanter L20)

The Max HP component is close to 3/4's the component of the
Cleric 9 Center spell.

For all purposes, this new song resemebles the Enchanter
Berserker Strength spell across all party members.

It has half the range of Selo's Accelerando, and slightly
more range than Hymm, and close to equal range of Chant of Battle.

Harmonic.
